item.description: We all want to know the secret and we all have heard that it is magical. We call is Majestic!  Lets sit and watch the movie and then talk about it and how it can change our lives. How do we use the power behind the Secret??? This discussion group will go further that just the basic teaching from the movie. We will take it to the next step. Presented by Barb Tremlett.
item.how_to_find_us: Murphy Drive is located off of Northeastern Blvd in Nashua NH

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Movie & Discussion - "The Secret"
